price: Si Él quisiera, los haría desaparecer y crearía a otros seres [creyentes].
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
